title: Draginje
text: Draginje () is a <a href="village">village</a> in <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>. It is situated in the <a href="Koceljeva">Koceljeva</a> <a href="municipality">municipality</a>, in the <a href="Ma%C4%8Dva%20District">Mačva District</a> of <a href="Central%20Serbia">Central Serbia</a>. In 2002 the village had a <a href="Serb">Serb</a> ethnic majority and a population of 1,701, this included 319 people from the <a href="Romani%20people">Romani</a> minority. The <a href="association%20football">football</a> club <a href="FK%20Draginje">FK Draginje</a> hails from Draginje.
